com.adobe.web.algorithm

Class KMPSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.web.algorithm.KMPSearch

  • public class KMPSearch
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a standard Implementation of the KMP pattern search algorithm.
    Author:
    Ramanshu Mahaur

    • Method Detail

      • preProcessPattern

        public int[] preProcessPattern(byte[] ptrn)
        Preprocess the failure matrix for the search pattern.
        Parameters:
        ptrn - The pattern to be searched.
        Returns:
        The failure matrix for the pattern to be searched.

      • searchSubString

        public int searchSubString(byte[] text,
                  int offset,
                  int limit)
        Search for the pattern in the byte array provided.
        Parameters:
        text - Byte Array over which search happens.
        offset - Array offset from which to start the search.
        limit - Array offset until up till which to search the pattern.
        Returns:
        First index at which the pattern is found in array region bounded by limits.

      • searchAllSubString

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> searchAllSubString(byte[] text,
                                                        int offset,
                                                        int limit)
        Search for all instances of the pattern in the byte array provided.
        Parameters:
        text - Byte Array over which search happens.
        offset - Array offset from which to start the search.
        limit - Array offset until up till which to search the pattern.
        Returns:
        Array list of indices at which the pattern is found in the array region bounded by limits.
